capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Snape's family history and it's actually pretty interesting. He comes from a mixed wizarding background, which is quite unique. His mother was Merope Gaunt, a witch from the ancient pure-blood families, while his father was Tobias Snape, who wasn't exactly a pure-blood himself. It's fascinating to see how this blend of bloodlines shaped Snape's life and ultimately influenced his loyalties and actions in the wizarding world.
